file_insights.primary_purpose: Populate historical uptime data for machines

patterns_discovered: Flexible machine data handling (MachineStats and MachineAttempt)
Fallback mechanism with demo data generation
gotchas_discovered: Handling cases with no machine data
Managing different data source types (dict vs ORM object)
Calculating uptime with varying attempt success rates

approach_outcome.records_created_strategy: Populate uptime history for known machines
approach_outcome.fallback_mechanism: Generate demo data if no machines found

recommendations: Consider adding logging instead of print statements
Implement unit tests for daily stats calculation function
Add configuration for history days and demo machine generation
